title: Chocolate web cake
ingredients: ['Cake', '165g (5 1/2 oz) plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300g (11 oz) caster sugar', '100g (3 3/4 oz) butter', '300ml (1/2 pint) evaporated milk', '2 eggs', '60g baking chocolate, melted', 'Filling', '60g baking chocolate, melted', '275g (10oz) butter', '275g (10oz) caster sugar', '175ml (6 fl oz) evaporated milk', '1 dessertspoon vanilla extract']
